forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Terms addition in regards to profile customization

comments.text: Hi all! Based on some reports and real (virtual) world examples, we've added the following to the terms...
... it should be already obvious, but good to have it in writing:
"Using ways to confuse your profile UI so that it can lead to functionality misunderstanding or complication, e.g. by covering the report flag button, is against the terms."
As always, our #1 priority is happiness of everyone in Anyland. Thx to those who reported this!
it would be cool if we could have this as an official feature, without needing to rely on the somewhat-unreliable (and unintuitive) method of using 'most collected things'.

thread.latestCommentText: it would be cool if we could have this as an official feature, without needing to rely on the somewhat-unreliable (and unintuitive) method of using 'most collected things'.
